text: [Music]
my name is Ivan Guevara I am a knight
here at medieval times I've been doing
this for approximately six years now
[Music]
when I started here I started just Asus
quiet it was a part-time job and I saw
how everything that the Knights did and
riding horses and fighting and it felt
very emotional to me like it was very
captivating how all the guys would just
go out each other and fight maybe so
realistic and I just wanted to do that
myself and I started training to do so
six months to a year of training so we
can learn the choreography and the
horseback riding it's a very physical
job like sometimes we can land wrong get
a sprained ankle or something but that's
why we train we practice every day on
the regular to make sure that we
eliminate hurting each other or
eliminate like an accident with a horse
more than physicality believe it or not
it's a lot of discipline discipline
discipline discipline because you want
to do something you want to make sure
that you're capable of doing it every
day like constantly just be in there put
it in the ward no matter like what
happens in your outside life if you
wanted to come in here with an attitude
of like I'm gonna get this done I'm
gonna go through with it and I'm gonna
enjoy every every every minute of it you
could work yourself into having a good
physical body but if you don't have the
discipline to do so then it's going to
be really tough to become part of what
we do here it takes a lot of discipline
I really enjoy when little kids kind of
come and then they come after to another
show and they say do you remember me
I've had little girls literally just hug
me and start crying because they were so
happy that I nothing beats that
[Music]
